DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine new pulse oximeter accurately detect carboxyhemoglobin methemoglobin intentionally increase blood .
DOC.criteria: Subjects significant medical problem Subject willing provide write informed consent Subject 18 45 year age Has BMI great 31 Has relevant injury sensor location site Has deformity abnormality may prevent proper application device test Has know respiratory condition Is currently smoker Has know heart cardiovascular condition Is currently pregnant Is female actively try get pregnant Has clotting disorder Is know hemoglobinopathy ( anemia , bilirubinemia , sicklecell anemia , inherit congenital methemoglobinemia ) The subject COHb great 3 % MetHb great 2 % Has take blood thinner medication aspirin within last 24 hour Has unacceptable collateral circulation ulnar artery Has donate 300 mL blood within one month prior start study Is unwilling unable provide write informed consent participate study Is unwilling unable comply study procedure Has another health condition opinion principal investigator make him/her unsuitable test
